place.name: ST ERVAN
place.gazetteerText: ERVAN (St.), a parish in St. Columb district, Cornwall; on the coast, 4 miles SSW of Padstow, and 14 NW of St. Austell r. station. Post town, St. Issey, Cornwall. Acres, 3, 218; of which 110 are water. Real property, £2, 942. Pop., 437. Houses, 89. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Exeter. Value, £405.* Patron, the Rev. H. N. Barton. The church is good; and there are chapels for Wesleyans and Plymouth Brethren. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
